name: Wildcard Casino
description:
This game was created for GMTK Game Jam 2022, within 48 hours.
Theme: Roll of the Dice.

Welcome to the Wildcard Casino!

Obtain tokens and increase your score while moving through the casino by forcing machines to pay out and calming down rowdy patrons, all while your weapon gets changed up every few seconds! Don't die, have fun, and most importantly, don't lose your cash!

The team:

Art:  
Olivier Dral ( Characters, Rigging, Animations, VFX, Lighting, QA, Audio, Goated with the Sauce) 
Vassil Mihaylov ( Environment art, Concept art, Lighting ) 
Reina H. ( Environment art, UI/UX art, Nothing )

Design: 
Frits de Laat ( Level design, QA, Lighting, Environment art, Carpenter ) 
Xan Hisam ( System design ) 
Jeroen Visscher ( System design, UI/UX design, QA, Tech design, Is good, actually )

Programming:
Dion van der Wateren ( Gameplay programming, AI programming, God ) 
roll0d3 ( Generalist )

Audio: 
Salvati ( Music )

Controls:

Walking - WASD
Shooting - Left mouse button
